testcase.name: Element validation
testcase.system-out: Given User input URL in browser address bar.................................passed And User waits for Homepage to load.........................................passed Then User is shown Title as "Selenium Practice - Browser Windows"...........passed And User enter user details as "TestFName" "TestEmail" "TestAddress"........passed And User select checkbox "2"................................................passed And User select radio button "igottwo"......................................passed And User click on "Double Click Me".........................................passed And User click link on "HomewPWPU"..........................................passed And User closes the page....................................................passed
